Create An OpenCCC Account
First-Time UserCalifornia Community Colleges
How To…

text_boxes.text: Create An OpenCCC Account
First-Time UserCalifornia Community Colleges
How To…

slides.slide_text:
Why do you need an OpenCCC Account?
OpenCCC is the student account system for all 116 California Community Colleges.
Regardless of which college you are attending, OpenCCC generates a one-time CCC-ID for every student across the system. 
The CCCID ensures all your applications and records are consolidated in one place throughout your college journey in the CCC system.
[OCR Error: Tesseract language data not found. Please install tesseract-data-eng package or download eng.traineddata]
Step 1: Get Started

Reminder: If you already have an OpenCCC account, Sign In using your email address, or click the Recover Account link to reset your password.
1. Click the Create An Account link on Sign In page

OpenCCC is the student account system for all 116 California Community Colleges.
Regardless of which college you are attending, OpenCCC generates a one-time CCC-ID for every student across the system. 
The CCCID ensures all your applications and records are consolidated in one place throughout your college journey in the CCC system.

slides.slide_text:
Here’s what you need to create your account
A unique email address
Access to your email account
Chrome or Safari browser recommended

If you’re using a mobile device…
A unique, mobile phone number
Access to your mobile device
Email address to complete setting up your account

slides.slide_text:
[OCR Error: Tesseract language data not found. Please install tesseract-data-eng package or download eng.traineddata]
Retrieve your  security code to verify your identity
Access your email account and find the email from California Community Colleges
Copy the six-digit security code
Return to the Verify Your Account page and enter the code in the Verification Code field
Important Notes:
The security code is time-sensitive
Enter your code within 10 minutes
Three retries are allowed
Request a new code at any time

4. Click Verify Email button to verify your identity

Step 3:  Verify Your Account
3. Enter security code in the Verification Code field
3
4

Enter and confirm your date of birth

Our Commitment to Security & Privacy
OpenCCC uses two-factor (2FA) authentication for identity security 
Your personal information is secure
Your information is never sold or shared with third parties
Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest

8. Click Create Account button to finish
Step 5:  Create Password & Finish
7. Create and confirm your secure password

OpenCCC is the student account system for all 116 California Community Colleges.
Regardless of which college you are attending, OpenCCC generates a one-time CCC-ID for every student across the system. 
The CCCID ensures all your applications and records are consolidated in one place throughout your college journey in the CCC system.
